title: Club Owner Bug
body:
I have multiple accounts that are a part of this club, however on the account that the club was created, I have no access to the club. This means that I cannot invite anyone new or even enable the club tag on this account.

This has persisted for months, however I doubt the issue will resolve itself hence why I am posting here.

The club name is "Out of the Black" and the club tag is "OotFB".

replies.body: I have the same bug! Name 'SwootyDatBooty', Thanks!
I've booked your account to make sure it's sync'd to your club.  Everything should be okay now!
Thank you! Everything is sorted now, I appreciate it.
